name: Recreate It Ronald
description:
Two players competing to win, one trying to wreck stuff and the other trying to recreate what has been destroyed. If everything gets recreated within the time limit the fixer wins. If the time runs out without everything being recreated the wrecker wins. Each player has unique abilities to help them reach their goal.

How to play:

Wrecker uses WASD and spacebar

Fixer can use arrow keys, Enter and numpad-plus, or (on danish keyboard layout) PLÆØ, " - " and " . ".
